title: Eventually a torch without internet access
comment: I'm glad to have found an app which only turns on the flash to be used as a flash light and doesn't need Internet permissions.

title: Works
comment: // , Unlike some of the other junk on here, this app is dead simple. How can we support this?

title: Ok but has bug
comment: Like it for minimal permissions. But can not turn off flash light by pressing button. Only exit will turn it off on some devices.
